H0.text: who developed a set of postulates to prove that specific microorganisms cause disease. Louis Pasteur

H3.text: who developed a set of postulates to prove that specific microorganisms cause disease. Robert Koch

A4.text: Koch's methods led to the establishment of a medical concept known as Koch's postulates

A5.text: Koch's discovery of the causative agent of anthrax led to the formation of a generic set of postulates
